intension: Design a Youtube thumbnail for a video about the Metaverse, a futuristic virtual reality world. The image should include a gamer wearing VR glasses and showcase the 3D and online experiences of the Metaverse. The text 'virtualverse.com' should be included to direct viewers to a related website.
globalcaption: The image features a man wearing a suit and tie, standing in front of a pink background. He is wearing a pair of virtual reality goggles and appears to be reaching out with his hand, possibly interacting with something in the virtual world. The man's suit and tie give him a professional appearance, and his engagement with the virtual reality technology suggests that he might be using it for work or personal purposes.
keywords: technology, futuristic, metaverse, digital, future, vr, online, internet, innovation, virtual reality, connection, virtual, glasses, meta, gadget, meta verse, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a black background with a pink circle in the center. The circle is surrounded by a grid of white dots, which are scattered around the circle in various positions. The dots are of different sizes and are placed at different distances from the circle, creating a visually interesting pattern

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a man wearing a suit and tie, standing in front of a white background. He is wearing a pair of virtual reality goggles, which are placed on his forehead. The man appears to be reaching out with his hand, possibly interacting with a virtual object or participating in a virtual activity
